import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {ListbookService} from "./listbook.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-list-books', templateUrl: './list-books.component.html', styleUrls: ['./list-books.component.css'] }) export class ListBooksComponent { books: any = []; constructor(private listBookService: ListbookService) { } ngOnInit(): void{ this.listBookService.getAllBooks().subscribe(response => { this.books = response; console.log(response); }) } }
